title: file path as doc index
body:
https://golang.org/pkg/net/http/ why is `func CanonicalHeaderKey(s string) string` not indexed under `type Header`?

Is it possible to create a index based on file path, for example `/src/net/http/header.go`?

Also the same indentation of type functions `func (r *Request) AddCookie(c *Cookie)` and normal functions `func NewRequest(method, urlStr string, body io.Reader) (*Request, error)` under `type Request` confuses new comers like me that don't recognize the signature `func (r *Request)`.
